The following standards will be assessed on the DATA quiz:

## DATA-PREP

You should be able to:

- Identify which kind of features require preparation
- Offer appropriate methods for preparing those features
- Explain the steps necessary to implement the methods selected

## FLOW2

You should be able to:

- Describe the five steps of the ML workflow
- Give examples of tasks you can do for each step

## Study Tips

Review the lecture slides, workbooks, homework assignments, and the associated lab.  
Quiz questions are similar (though not identical) to the types of questions covered in these materials.
You should be able to use appropriate terminology and apply the concepts covered in class to a variety of new scenarios.

The primary goal of each quiz is to give you an opportunity to apply concepts with clear and well-explained reasoning.  
Quizzes are also a valuable opportunity to receive feedback on your reasoning skills.
